trans-unit.source: Provides a container class for Internet host address information.
trans-unit.target: 提供網際網路主機位址資訊的容器 (Container) 類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.IPHostEntry> class associates a Domain Name System (DNS) host name with an array of aliases and an array of matching IP addresses.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.IPHostEntry>類別會關聯網域名稱系統 (DNS) 主機名稱別名的陣列和陣列的比對的 IP 位址。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.IPHostEntry> class is used as a helper class with the <xref:System.Net.Dns> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.IPHostEntry>類別當做具有的 helper 類別<xref:System.Net.Dns>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example queries the DNS database for information on the host www.contoso.com and returns the information in an <xref:System.Net.IPHostEntry> instance.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會查詢 DNS 資料庫中的主機 www.contoso.com 的詳細資訊，並傳回中的資訊<xref:System.Net.IPHostEntry>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.IPHostEntry" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPHostEntry" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a list of IP addresses that are associated with a host.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與主機關聯的 IP 位址清單。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> that contains IP addresses that resolve to the host names that are contained in the <see cref="P:System.Net.IPHostEntry.Aliases" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> 型別的陣列，含有 IP 位址，解析在 <see cref="P:System.Net.IPHostEntry.Aliases" /> 屬性中所含有的主機名稱。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Net.IPHostEntry.AddressList%2A> property to access the IP addresses that are associated with the <xref:System.Net.IPHostEntry>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Net.IPHostEntry.AddressList%2A>屬性存取相關聯的 IP 位址<xref:System.Net.IPHostEntry>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a list of aliases that are associated with a host.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與主機關聯的別名清單。

trans-unit.source: An array of strings that contain DNS names that resolve to the IP addresses in the <see cref="P:System.Net.IPHostEntry.AddressList" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 含有 DNS 名稱的字串陣列，其解析在 <see cref="P:System.Net.IPHostEntry.AddressList" /> 屬性中所包含的 IP 位址。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the DNS name of the host.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定主機的 DNS 名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the primary host name for the server.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含伺服器的主要主機名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.IPHostEntry.HostName%2A> property contains the primary host name for a server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.IPHostEntry.HostName%2A>屬性包含伺服器的主要主機名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the DNS entry for the server defines additional aliases, they will be available in the <xref:System.Net.IPHostEntry.Aliases%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果伺服器的 DNS 項目會定義額外的別名，它們就可以在<xref:System.Net.IPHostEntry.Aliases%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Net.IPHostEntry.HostName%2A> property to retrieve the primary host name.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Net.IPHostEntry.HostName%2A>屬性，以擷取主要主機名稱。
